dialogue_history:
#Speaker_1#: Good morning. What can I do for you?
 #Speaker_2#: I’m in Room 309. I’m checking out today. Can I have my bill now?
 #Speaker_1#: Certainly. Please wait a moment. Here you are.
 #Speaker_2#: Thanks. Wait…What’s this? The 30 dollar for?
 #Speaker_1#: Excuse me… The charge for your laundry service on Nov. 20th.
 #Speaker_2#: But I didn’t take any laundry service during my stay here. I think you have added someone else’s.
 #Speaker_1#: Ummm… Sorry, would you mind waiting amoment? We check it with the department concerned.
 #Speaker_2#: No. As long as we get this straightened out.
 #Speaker_1#: I’m very sorry. There has been a mistake. We’ll corrected the bill. Please take a look.
 #Speaker_2#: Okay, here you are.
 #Speaker_1#: Goodbye
dialogue_summary: #Speaker_1# helps #Speaker_2# correct a mischarged bill on laundry service and helps #Person_2# check out.
